src:
Prediksi Liga 1 Senin: Persela Lamongan Vs Barito Putera
03 Nov 2019, 19:51 by Antara, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Liga 1 Indonesia pekan ke-27 akan dibuka oleh laga Persela Lamongan kontra Barito Putera. Kedua kesebelasan dijadwalkan dijadwalkan bertemu pada Senin, 4 November 2019 di Stadion Surajaya, Kabupaten Lamongan, Jawa Timur. Sepak mula pukul 18:30 WIB dan disiarkan oleh O Channel.
Persela bersama pelatih Nil Maizar hingga kini masih mempunyai pekerjaan rumah yang belum terselesaikan. Selain belum tampil konsisten, Nil menyatakan, ada persoalan teknis yang dialami oleh para pemain, yakni aspek penyelesaian akhir. Kondisi itu coba diatasi jelang menjamu Barito.
Striker Persela, Alex dos Santos, nampak kesulitan mengemas gol. Padahal di awal musim produktivitas gol dia tinggi. Buktinya, ia masih bertengger sebagai top skor Liga 1 Indonesia, yakni 16 gol bersama dengan Marko Simic (Persija Jakarta).
Posisi tim berjuluk Joko Tingkir ini juga tidak bagus di klasemen Liga 1 Indonesia. Mereka masih terjebak di zona degradasi. Sementara Barito relatif berada dalam kondisi yang cukup bagus.
Datang ke markas Persela dengan berbekal kemenangan sebelumnya, Barito bisa menjadi batu sandungan. Tim yang dilatih oleh Djadjang Nurdjaman ini cukup stabil, terutama saat bermain di kandang sendiri. Tiga dari lima laga terakhir Barito di kandang berakhir dengan kemenangan. Laga nanti akan menjadi ujian bagi Samsul Arif dan kawan-kawan apakah bisa membawa pulang poin maksimal.

Komentar Tim



Pelatih Persela Lamongan, Nil Maizar


"Kami sudah melakukan banyak perubahan termasuk berkomunikasi dengan (striker) Alex dos Santos. Sebagai pemain asing tuntutan dari penonton itu harus memberikan kontribusi bagus. Sesuai kapasitasnya, karena pemain asing direkrut untuk itu. Mudah-mudahan dia bisa kasih yang terbaik."
"Kedua pemain itu (Samsul Arif dan Kosuke Yamazaki) akan kami antisipasi sebab mereka adalah pemain kunci dari Barito Putera."
"Kami akan mengusung spirit perlawanan dalam menjamu tim tamu Barito Putera."


Striker Barito Putera, Samsul Arif


Selalu exited saat bermain di sini. saya habiskan waktu selama 3 tahun di sini. mengenal banyak teman baik di luar dan dalam lapangan. saya pikir harus profesional menjalani pertandingan seperti biasanya. apalagi ini pertandingan penting dan kami berusaha meraih poin.


Pelatih Barito Putera, Djadjang Nurdjaman


"Rafael Silva absen karena akumulasi kartu saat main lawan Borneo FC kemarin."

Klasemen

Persela Lamongan kini berada di peringkat ke-16 klasemen Liga 1 Indonesia dengan 24 poin dari 25 laga. Jelas berbahaya karena kompetisi sudah mendekati ujung. Sedangkan Barito mengisi peringkat ke-12 dan mengemas 29 poin dari 26 pertandingan.

Head to Head

Hasil lima pertandingan terakhir Persela kurang bagus. Mereka hanya sekali menang, dua kali kalah dan dua kali imbang. Sementara Barito cukup bagus dengan membukukan tiga kemenangan, sekali kalah, dan sekali seri.
Barito Putera vs Persela Lamongan 0-0 (Liga 1 Indonesia)

Prediksi

Persela Lamongan jelas membutuhkan poin untuk keluar dari zona degradasi. Begitu juga dengan Barito Putera yang mencoba menjauh dari degradasi dan berupaya memasuki 10 besar. Oleh sebab itu, laga antarkedua kesebelasan diperkirakan bakal terbuka. Persela menang (45 persen). Barito menang (40 persen). Hasil imbang (15 persen).

BARITO PUTERA
text:
League 1 Prediction Monday: Lamongan vs Barito Putera
03 Nov 2019, 19:51 by Antara, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - League 1 Indonesia Week 27 will be opened by the Persela Lamongan match against Barito Putera. The two teams are scheduled to meet on Monday, November 4, 2019 at Surajaya Stadium, Lamongan Regency, East Java. Football starts at 18:30 WIB and is broadcast on O Channel.
Persela and coach Nil Maizar still have homework that still has not been completed. Besides not appearing consistent, Nil said, there were technical problems experienced by the players, namely the final settlement aspect. Try to overcome these conditions ahead of entertaining Barito.
Persela striker, Alex dos Santos, seems to be having trouble packing a goal. Even though at the beginning of the season he scored a high productivity. The proof, he is still perched as Indonesia's top League 1 score, which is 16 goals together with Marko Simic (Persija Jakarta).
The position of the team nicknamed Joko Tingkir is also not good in the Indonesian League 1 standings. They are still trapped in the relegation zone. While Barito is in relatively good condition.
Coming to the Persela headquarters armed with previous victories, Barito could be a stumbling block. The team trained by Djadjang Nurdjaman is quite stable, especially when playing at home. Three of Barito's last five matches at home ended in victory. The match will be a test for Samsul Arif and friends whether they can bring home maximum points.

Team Comments



Lamongan Persela coach, Nil Maizar


"We have made many changes including communicating with (striker) Alex dos Santos. As a foreign player the demands of the audience must make a good contribution. According to his capacity, because foreign players are recruited for it. Hopefully he can love the best."
"The two players (Samsul Arif and Kosuke Yamazaki) will be anticipated because they are the key players of Barito Putera."
"We will carry the spirit of resistance in entertaining the visiting team of Barito Putera."


Striker Barito Putera, Samsul Arif


Always exited when playing here. I spent 3 years here. get to know a lot of good friends outside and in the field. I think I have to go through the competition as usual. moreover it's an important match and we are trying to get points.


Barito Putera's coach, Djadjang Nurdjaman


"Rafael Silva was absent because of the accumulation of cards when playing against Borneo FC yesterday."

Standings

Persela Lamongan is now ranked 16th in the Indonesian League 1 standings with 24 points from 25 matches. Obviously dangerous because the competition is nearing the end. While Barito filled 12th place and packed 29 points from 26 matches.

Head to Head

The results of the last five matches Persela is not good. They only win once, lose twice and draw twice. While Barito is good enough to record three wins, one defeat and one draw.
Barito Putera vs Persela Lamongan 0-0 (Liga 1 Indonesia)

Prediction

Persela Lamongan clearly needs points to get out of the relegation zone. Likewise with Barito Putera who tried to stay away from relegation and tried to enter the top 10. Therefore, the match between the two teams is expected to open. Persela wins (45 percent). Barito won (40 percent). Draw (15 percent).

BARITO SON
